Complete the following Nike mandatory trainings in the first 2 weeks depending on the department you're in:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/NIKESQDEHQ/Nike+mandatory+trainings\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Nike mandatory trainings - Nike EHQ - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Should you have any questions, ask your teammates or ScrumMaster.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Happy onboarding!\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
